text:
April 27, 1954
Mr. D. Glenn Starlin
Director of Radio
Radio Station KVAX
University of Oregon
College of Liberal Arte
Eugene, Oregon
Dear Glenn*
Thanks for your letter of April 26 on possible Cast©11
series for the Network, The decision as to which series should
best be submitted for possible distribution cm the Network 1® not
properly mine, but belongs to the Radio Program Planning Committee,
to which I shall send copies of your letter. lou will hear from
the Committee through its chairman, Frank Schooley, or through me.
1 trust you have by now received the decision on the
Spencer Snow series. The split vote was broken at Columbus, and
we plan to distribute the programs this summer.
Rest regards,
Sincerely,
John R. Holt
Network Manager
JRHiiar
cot Mr, Graydon Aumus ^
Radio Program Planning Committee
